entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
